detailsData.title: Experienced & Affordable
detailsData.content: Offering competent, fair-priced legal advice with a personal touch.

detailsData.title: Committed to Small Businesses
detailsData.content: Passionate about helping small business owners succeed.

detailsData.title: Specializing in Small Business
detailsData.content: Focused on providing legal services tailored for small businesses.

address: 2535 Kettner Blvd. Suite 2C-2. San Diego, CA 92101
subHeading: Helping Southern California’s Small Business Owners Succeed
valueProp: Pokala Law APC is committed to helping small business owners in the San Diego area to succeed. We have a real passion for helping small business clients, especially those in the arts sector, navigate the legalities connected to running a business.
CTA: Helping Southern California’s Small Business Owners Succeed

testimonalData.text: Kalyan is a fantastic lawyer who truly cares about his clients. He helped me navigate a complex legal issue with ease.
testimonalData.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonalData.text: The team at Pokala Law APC is top-notch. They provided me with excellent legal advice and support for my business.
testimonalData.author: Michael Smith

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Pokala Law APC for any small business legal needs. They are professional, knowledgeable, and dedicated.
testimonalData.author: Emily Brown
